basic.name: Do Nothing
basic.notes: Take no action (Active Defenses at -4 if taking Do Nothing due to Stun; roll vs HT/IQ)

basic.name: Change Posture
basic.notes: Standing, sitting, kneeling, crawling, prone, lying face up (see B364/MA98). Prone to standing takes two turns (Exception Acrobatic Stand)

basic.name: Move
basic.notes: Do nothing but move (See Sprinting B354 and Acrobatic Movement MA105+)

basic.name: Concentrate
basic.notes: Focus on mental task. Taking an active defense or being knocked down, injured, distracted etc. requires a Will-3 roll to maintain

basic.name: Evaluate
basic.notes: Study a foe prior to a melee attack (+1 per turn to subsequent attacks or feints, max. +3); may also use the Evaluate Bonus to cancel out penalties from Deceptive Attacks or feints

basic.name: Wait
basic.movement: You may also perform a Step and Wait, loosing your Step in the proceeding Maneuver
basic.notes: Hold your action, then take an Attack, All-Out Attack, Committed Attack, Defensive Attack, Feint, Ready or Stop Hit. Specify exactly what your action will be and what will trigger it.

basic.name: Ready
basic.movement: You can move only a step.
basic.notes: Ready or reload a weapon, adjust reach (B269), change grip, change hands (MA102).

meleeAttacks.name: Melee Attack
meleeAttacks.movement: You can move only a step.
meleeAttacks.notes: Attack unarmed or with a ready weapon, you make take a step before or after you attack.

meleeAttacks.name: Move and Attack
meleeAttacks.movement: You can performa a fulll move. -2 to avoid falling.
meleeAttacks.notes: Move and attack at a penalty (Ranged: -2 or weapon's bulk; non-slam Melee: -4, max. skill 9). For thrusting attacks, may use slam damage (HP x velocity/100). Not compatible with Flurry of Blows, Mighty Blow, Giant Step, Combos, Rapid Strike or Decepctive Attack (except Slams or cinematics techiniques wich require final effective skill of at least 10). If you attacked using an arm, you cannot use that arm to parry (if the attach involved a fist, elbon or weapon) or block (if you user a shield or cloak). If you used any other body part to attack, you cannot dodge. You can use any other defense but you cannot never retreat.

meleeAttacks.name: Defensive Attack
meleeAttacks.movement: You can move only a step.
meleeAttacks.notes: Balanced weapon: +1 Parry/Block, Unbalanced weapon: +1 Parry/Block with different weapon or Parry with the same weapon, Kick: +2 to avoid Leg Grapple and DX rolls to avoid falling. -2 to damage (or -1 per die if worse), foe gets +1 to defend against a grab or grapple

Committed Attack.name: Determined
Committed Attack.notes: +2 to hit, or take two steps at -2 to hit for a total modifier of 0. May move before or after an attack. The attacker cannot parry with the hand(s) he used to attack, block if he attacked with his shield or cloak, or dodge if he kicked. He can use any other defense, but at -2. He cannot retreat.

Committed Attack.name: Strong
Committed Attack.notes: +1 to damage (or +1 per two full damage dice), ST-based attacks only, may take 2 steps at -2 to skill, may move before or after an attack

All-Out Attacks Melee.name: Double
All-Out Attacks Melee.notes: 2 attacks on same foe with ready weapon (-4 to off-hand without Ambidexterity)

All-Out Attacks Melee.name: Feint
All-Out Attacks Melee.notes: Make one feint and one attack on the same foe.

All-Out Attacks Melee.name: Long
All-Out Attacks Melee.notes: Increase reach by 1 yard (Swing attacks at -2 dmg or -1 per die), may end in crouch (MA87)

rangedAttacks.name: Aim
rangedAttacks.movement: You can move only a step. You get no step if your two-handed weapon is braced
rangedAttacks.notes: Taking an active defense spoils your Aim; if you are injured, make a Will roll or lose your Aim. Aim a ranged weapon to get its Acc bonus (+1 for bracing, +1 for 2 turns, +2 for 3+ turns, the combined bonus from all targeting systems cannot exceed the weapons base Accuracy).

All-Out Attacks Ranged.name: All-Out Suppression Fire
All-Out Attacks Ranged.notes: RoF 5+ targets 2 yard zone - RoF 10+ suppress multiple, adjacent 2 yard zones with 5+ Shots/zone

activeDefenses.name: All-Out Defense Increased
activeDefenses.notes: Two different Defenses against one attack

activeDefenses.name: All-Out Defense Mental
activeDefenses.notes: +2 to all resistance rolls against magic, psi, and anything similar. This bonus persists until your next turn

activeDefenses.name: Dodge and Drop / Dive Scrificial
activeDefenses.notes: +3 to Dodge - may take a step before drop, ranged attacks only If you make your dodge roll, you get hit - if you fail, original victim gets his defense roll

activeDefenses.name: Dodge Acrobatics
activeDefenses.notes: -2/+2 to Dodge - once per turn, can be combined with retreat

extraEffort.name: Flurry of Blows
extraEffort.notes: Spend 1 FP per attack to halve the penalty for Rapid Strike to -3 (B370, usually -6, if you spend 1 FP you half it to -3)

extraEffort.name: Giant Step
extraEffort.notes: Spend 1 FP for one extra step (before or after your attack) during an Attack or Defensive Attack.

extraEffort.name: Great Lunge
extraEffort.notes: Spend 1 FP to get the effects of All-Out Attack (Long) without losing defenses (incompatible with All-Out Attack, Defensive Attack, Defensive Grip).

extraEffort.name: Heroic Charge
extraEffort.notes: Spend 1 FP during a Move and Attack to ignore the skill penalty and cap (except for Acrobatic Attack or Flying Attack).

extraEffort.name: Mighty Blow
extraEffort.notes: Spend 1 FP per attack to get the All-Out Attack (Strong) damage bonus to an Attack without losing defenses.

extraEffort.name: Feverish Defense
extraEffort.notes: Spend 1 FP to add +2 to a single active defense roll (except when using All-Out Attack or Committed Attack)

extraEffort.name: Rapid Recovery
extraEffort.notes: Spend 1 FP to Parry with an unbalanced weapon during an Attack, or any weapon during a Move and Attack

Melee Options.name: Deceptive Attack
Melee Options.notes: Target suffers a -1 to active defense for every -2 taken to melee skill (min. skill of 10), or -1 to Dodge for every -2 taken to ranged skill (min. skill of 10).

Melee Options.name: Rapid Strike
Melee Options.notes: Take a penalty to yout Parry (min. 8), not including modifiers. If Parry succeeds and yor attacks using the parrying weapon next turn, apply the same penalty to your foes Parry (hand or weapon), Block(shield) or Dodge (no-hand unarmed strike) or half that penalty to all other defenses.

Melee Options.name: Riposte
Melee Options.notes: Make two attacks, both at -6, to replace one normal attack. Can target seperate foes. Ranged Rapid Strikes if RoF 2+. Half penalty for Weaponmaster or Gunslinger

Melee Options.name: Stop Hit
Melee Options.notes: +4 to hit, +2 to defend against. Not compatible with Deceptive Attack, Evaluate, Riposte or Feint. Does not affect critical chance.

Melee Options.name: Telegraphic Attack
Melee Options.notes: Take a Wait Maneuver and declare that you intend to attack. Both roll to hit. Both fail, nothing happens. If one hits, the other defends at -1 or -3 if Parry with same weapon. If both hit, larger margin of success defends normally, other at penalty above. If tied, both have above penalty. Possible with Unbalaced/Unready Weapon.

Melee Options.name: Tip Slash
Melee Options.notes: Swing a thrusting, impaling weapon to do cutting damage equal to the weapons impaling damage -2

Ranged Options.name: Pop-Up Attack
Ranged Options.notes: Ranged attacks only, attacker suffers -2 to hit, no aim possible, may step. Not possible with bow or sling
